scripts.release:patch: npm --prefix frontend version patch -m "chore: bumped version to %s" && git push && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm --prefix frontend version minor -m "chore: bumped version to %s" && git push && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm --prefix frontend version major -m "chore: bumped version to %s" && git push && git push --follow-tags
